name: Food Fight
summary: You'll have a blast, folks! Come run, jump and fight Jalapenos in Food Fight! This demo is to feature 2 levels and a boss! It also serves as an introduction of what's to come! Our Protagonist, Starla McCormick has found herself at the "Snock Advanced Gay Expo" and out of pure boredom, goes through the eerie catacombs of Gravestone Grease and the cold streets of Freezy Freeze Fields! Are you up for it?
